Class BaseFileBrowser

java.lang.Object
  org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.tasks.impl.BaseFileBrowser
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileBrowser
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseLogicalFileBrowser
public abstract class BaseFileBrowser
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileBrowser

Base abstract implementation of a file browser.

exists

public boolean exists(java.lang.String path)
Description copied from interface: FileBrowser
Returns true if there exists a file object at the given path on the current resource, false otherwise. This method can be used, for example, to test if a file or directory exists at the given path, and to take some action based on the results.

Specified by:
exists in interface FileBrowser
Parameters:
path - The path on the current resource
Returns:
True if the path results in a valid file location, false otherwise.
